content: Each code can be used once. You can get new codes anytime. Only codes which were generated last are valid.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a message indicating that each backup code can be used only once and new codes can be obtained. It is displayed in a dialogue window, prompting users to review and use their backup codes before generating new ones.

usage.context:
<StyledBodyContent id="backup-codes-print-content">
 <Text className="backup-codes-description-one" lineHeight="20px">
 {t("BackupCodesDescription")}
 </Text>
 <Text className="backup-codes-description-two" lineHeight="20px">
 {t("BackupCodesSecondDescription")}
 </Text>
 
 <Text
 className="backup-codes-counter"
 fontWeight={600}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Only codes which were generated last are valid" is not accurately translated. The English implies that only the most recently generated codes are valid. The Arabic translation, "فقط الرموز التي تم إنشاؤها في الماضي صالحة" translates to "Only codes that were created in the past are valid," which is not the intended meaning. It's confusing and could be misinterpreted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يمكن استخدام كل رمز مرة واحدة. يمكنك الحصول على رموز جديدة في أي وقت. فقط الرموز الحديثة صالحة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Only codes which were generated last are valid' is not accurately translated. The English implies that only the most recently generated codes are valid, not just any codes that have been generated. The Azerbaijani 'Yalnız generasiya olunmuş kodlar düzgündür' translates more to 'Only generated codes are valid,' which is too broad.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hər bir kod bir dəfə istifadə oluna bilər. Yeni kodu istənilən zaman əldə edə bilərsiniz. Yalnız sonuncu dəfə yaradılmış kodlar düzgündür.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Only codes which were generated last are valid' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Only codes which were generated last are valid'. A more natural rendering would be something like 'Pouze nejnovější kódy jsou platné.' or 'Platné jsou pouze nejnověji vygenerované kódy.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pouze nejnovější kódy jsou platné.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Man darf jeden Code nur einmal benutzen" is a bit awkward. A more natural translation would be something like "Jeden Code darf man nur einmal verwenden" or "Jeder Code ist nur einmal gültig".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jeder Code ist nur einmal gültig.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Nur am letzten generierten Codes sind gültig" is grammatically incorrect and doesn't accurately convey the meaning. The sentence implies that only codes are valid, not the act of generating them.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nur die zuletzt generierten Codes sind gültig.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing "am letzten generierten Codes" is grammatically incorrect in German.  It should be 'zuletzt generierten'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: zuletzt generierten

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Վավեր են միայն այն կոդերը, որոնք ստեղծվել են վերջին անգամ:" is not a direct or natural translation of "Only codes which were generated last are valid." A more accurate translation would be something like "Միայն վերջինս ստացած կոդերը են գործող:" or "Միայն վերջինս գեներացված կոդերը են օրինական:" The current phrasing is a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Միայն վերջինս ստացած կոդերը են գործող:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Sono validi solo i codici che sono stati generati per ultimi" is a literal translation of 'Only codes which were generated last are valid'. While technically correct, it sounds awkward and unnatural in Italian. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the recency of the codes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sono validi solo gli ultimi codici generati.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ສ້າງ' (saang) is used, which translates to 'created' or 'built'. While technically correct, 'ຜະລິດ' (phalit) which means 'generated' or 'produced' would be a more appropriate and natural fit in this context, aligning better with the English 'generated'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ແຕ່ລະລະຫັດສາມາດໃຊ້ໄດ້ຄັ້ງດຽວ. ທ່ານສາມາດໄດ້ຮັບລະຫັດໃຫມ່ໄດ້ທຸກເວລາ. ມີພຽງລະຫັດທີ່ຜະລິດຂຶ້ນຫຼ້າສຸດເທົ່ານັ້ນທີ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "kiedykolwiek zechcesz" (whenever you want) doesn't quite capture the nuance of "anytime." It sounds a bit too formal and doesn't convey the ease of generating new codes as well as the original English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nowe kody możesz wygenerować w dowolnym momencie.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing "Wyłącznie ostatnio wygenerowane kody są ważne" is a bit clunky and doesn't flow naturally. It's a direct translation of "Only codes which were generated last are valid" which is not idiomatic Polish.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tylko ostatnio wygenerowane kody są aktualne.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'generate' is misspelled as 'gererate'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: generate

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Only codes which were generated last are valid' is not perfectly captured by 'Действительны только последние сгенерированные коды.'. A more accurate translation would emphasize the recency of the codes, perhaps something like 'Действительны только самые свежие сгенерированные коды' or 'Действуют только самые последние сгенерированные коды'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Действительны только самые свежие сгенерированные коды

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Only codes which were generated last are valid' is not a direct or natural translation of 'Only codes which were generated last are valid'. A more accurate translation would emphasize the most recent codes are the valid ones.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Only the most recently generated codes are valid.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'වලංගු වන්නේ අවසන් වරට උත්පාදනය කරන ලද කේත පමණි' is a bit awkward. A smoother construction would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: අවසන් වරට උත්පාදනය කරන ලද කේත වලංගු වේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Сваки код може бити коришћен само једном' sounds slightly awkward. While grammatically correct, it's a passive construction that can be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Сваки код се може користити само једном.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'генерисани последњи пут' is redundant and a bit clunky.  'Последњи' already implies the latest.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Само су кодови који су најновије генерисани важећи.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Samo su kodovi koji su generisani poslednji put važeći' is grammatically awkward. The passive voice is not the most natural way to express this in Serbian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Samo kodovi generisani poslednji put važe.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Only codes which were generated last are valid" is not a direct or natural translation of "Each code can be used once. You can get new codes anytime. Only codes which were generated last are valid". A more accurate translation would be something along the lines of "Sadece en son oluşturulan kodlar geçerlidir." which is already present, but the preceding sentences don't flow as well in Turkish. While technically correct, the overall sequence feels slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the entire sequence for better flow in Turkish. For example: 'Her kod bir defa kullanılabilir. İstenildiği zaman yeni kodlar oluşturabilirsiniz. Sadece en son oluşturulmuş kodlar geçerlidir.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Дійсними є лише ті коди, які були створені останніми" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Only codes which were generated last are valid." A more accurate and natural translation would be something like "Лише останні коди дійсні" or "Дійсні лише останні коди". The current translation focuses on *who* created the codes, rather than the order of creation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Лише останні коди дійсні
